name: Custom Player Trail
description: Allows you to customize your player trail to any color you want, including rainbow

issues.info: Submit any issues on the GitHub or dm @gdemerald on Discord!

speed.name: Speed
speed.description: Set the speed the rainbow trail shifts color

offset.name: Offset
offset.description: Set an offset for the trail gradient

saturation.name: Saturation
saturation.description: Set the saturation of the trail

brightness.name: Brightness
brightness.description: Set the brightness (value) of the trail

enable-custom-color.name: Enable custom trail color
enable-custom-color.description: Enable custom color for your player trail

color-P1.name: Trail color P1
color-P1.description: Set the color of player 1 trail

color-P2.name: Trail color P2
color-P2.description: Set the color of player 2 trail

disable-trail-in-wave.name: Disable Trail In Wave
disable-trail-in-wave.description: Disable the trail during wave parts
